The 2001 Multishow Brazilian Music Awards () (or simply 2001 Multishow Awards) (Portuguese: Prêmio Multishow 2001) was held on 22 May 2001, at the Theatro Municipal in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. Nelson Motta and Fernanda Torres hosted the ceremony for the second consecutive time.
Winners and nominees
Nominees were announced on 13 March 2001. Winners are listed first and highlighted in boldface.
